The Head And The Heart’s new album, Let’s Be Still, was released through Kobalt Label Services on October 28. The 13-track album (released on Sub Pop in the U.S), is the follow up to the Seattle band’s critically and commercially successful self-titled debut, which was released in 2011 and went on to sell over 300,000 copies worldwide. 

The new album was recorded at Seattle’s Studio Litho and produced by the band along with Shawn Simmons. The album will be accompanied by the release of the first single, “Shake.”
